NAME: Ketel Marte
COMMENT: May 15: Marte went 2-for-4 with two home runs and three RBI in Wednesday's 8-7 win over the Giants.

NAME: Jordan Montgomery
COMMENT: Mar 26: The Diamondbacks placed Montgomery (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Wednesday, Alex Weiner of ArizonaSports.comreports.

NAME: Blake Walston
COMMENT: Mar 23: The Diamondbacks placed Walston (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Sunday.

NAME: J.T. Ginn
COMMENT: May 16: Ginn (elbow) threw 3.1 scoreless innings for Triple-A Las Vegas with five strikeouts and two walks during a rehab start Wednesday. He will travel with the A's for their upcoming road trip at San Francisco, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Luis Medina
COMMENT: May 12: Medina (elbow) began a throwing program March 17, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Ken Waldichuk
COMMENT: May 12: Waldichuk (elbow) threw his most recent bullpen session Saturday and is targeting a return from the 60-day injured list before the All-Star break, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Brady Basso
COMMENT: May 12: Basso (shoulder) is scheduled to throw a 15-pitch bullpen session this week, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Zack Gelof
COMMENT: May 5: Gelof (wrist) had his rehab assignment paused after being diagnosed with a stress reaction in his ribs, Martin Gallegos of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Ronald Acuna Jr.
COMMENT: May 16: Acuna (knee) went 2-for-3 with a double for Triple-A Gwinnett on Thursday.

NAME: Spencer Strider
COMMENT: May 15: Manager Brian Snitker said Thursday that Strider (hamstring) will be activated off the injured list to start one of Atlanta's games in Washington next week, 680 The Fan Atlanta reports.

NAME: Charles Leblanc
COMMENT: May 1: Atlanta reassigned Leblanc to minor-league camp Thursday.

NAME: Nacho Alvarez Jr.
COMMENT: Apr 23: Atlanta transferred Alvarez (wrist) from the 10-day injured list to the 60-day IL on Wednesday.

NAME: Reynaldo Lopez
COMMENT: Apr 8: Lopez underwent arthroscopic shoulder surgery Tuesday and will be shut down for 12 weeks, David O'Brien of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Joe Jimenez

COMMENT: May 9: Cowser (thumb) was seen playing catch Friday, Matt Weyrich of The Baltimore Sun reports.

NAME: Grayson Rodriguez

NAME: Kyle Bradish
COMMENT: Apr 28: Orioles manager Brandon Hyde said that Bradish (elbow) completed another bullpen session Monday, Roch Kubatko of MASNSports.com reports.

COMMENT: Apr 28: Orioles manager Brandon Hyde said Monday that Wells (elbow) will throw a bullpen session Friday, Jake Rill of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Justin Armbruester
COMMENT: Apr 25: Armbruester underwent right lat surgery Friday, Andy Kostka of TheBaltimoreBanner.com reports.

NAME: Cody Poteet
COMMENT: Apr 22: The Orioles placed Poteet on the 15-day injured list Tuesday with right shoulder inflammation.

NAME: Albert Suarez
COMMENT: Apr 12: Suarez (shoulder) said Saturday that he will be shut down from throwing for about three weeks, Matt Weyrich of The Baltimore Sun reports.

COMMENT: Mar 30: Martinez signed a minor-league contract with the Orioles on Thursday, Matt Weyrich of The Baltimore Sun reports.

NAME: Franklin Barreto
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Orioles reassigned Barreto to minor-league camp Monday, Jake Rill of MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 14: Manager Alex Cora said Tuesday that "as of now," Houck will make his next start Sunday against Atlanta, Chris Cotillo of MassLive.com reports.

NAME: Seby Zavala
COMMENT: May 8: Zavala, who is on Triple-A Worcester's 7-day injured list due to a left oblique strain, began a rehab assignment in the rookie-level Florida Complex League on Monday and went 1-for-3 with a double and a walk in his first game.

NAME: Masataka Yoshida
COMMENT: May 6: Yoshida (shoulder) said Tuesday that he received a cortisone shot a few days ago and will remain shut down from throwing for three more days, Jen McCaffrey of The Athletic reports.

COMMENT: May 4: Casas underwent successful surgery Sunday to repair the ruptured patellar tendon in his left knee, Chris Cotillo of MassLive.com reports.

COMMENT: Mar 27: The Red Sox placed Penrod on the 60-day injured list Thursday with a left elbow UCL sprain, Mac Cerullo of the Boston Herald reports.

NAME: Chris Murphy
COMMENT: Mar 27: Murphy (elbow) was thrown two bullpen sessions early this spring, Christopher Smith of MassLive reports.

NAME: Jovani Moran

NAME: Patrick Sandoval
COMMENT: Feb 17: The Red Sox placed Sandoval (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Saturday.

NAME: Tyson Miller
COMMENT: May 13: Miller (hip) struck out two over a scoreless inning during a rehab appearance with Triple-A Iowa on Tuesday.

NAME: Eli Morgan
COMMENT: May 10: The Cubs transferred Morgan (elbow) to the 60-day injured list Saturday, Taylor McGregor of Marquee Sports Network reports.

COMMENT: May 5: Imanaga has been diagnosed with a mild left hamstring strain that is expected to hold him out for more than two weeks, Bruce Levine of 670TheScore.com reports.

COMMENT: Apr 30: Cubs manager Craig Counsell said Friday that Assad has been shut down after being diagnosed with a Grade 2 left oblique strain, Jordan Bastian of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Justin Steele
COMMENT: Apr 23: The Cubs transferred Steele (elbow) to the 60-day injured list Wednesday, Sahadev Sharma of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Ben Heller
COMMENT: Mar 27: The Cubs signed Heller to a minor-league contract Monday, Andrew Destin of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reports.

NAME: Brandon Birdsell
COMMENT: Feb 26: Cubs manager Craig Counsell said Monday that Birdsell is dealing with an injury to his right shoulder/lat area, Meghan Montemurro of the Chicago Tribune reports.

NAME: Andrew Benintendi
COMMENT: May 15: Benintendi (calf) will be reevaluated in one or two weeks, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jesse Scholtens
COMMENT: May 13: The White Sox transferred Scholtens' (elbow) rehab assignment from High-A Winston-Salem to Triple-A Charlotte on Tuesday.

NAME: Austin Slater
COMMENT: May 12: Slater (knee) will begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A Charlotte on Tuesday, Kyle Williams of the Chicago Sun-Times reports.

COMMENT: May 8: The White Sox re-signed Drury (thumb) to a minor-league contract Tuesday.

NAME: Mike Tauchman
COMMENT: May 8: Tauchman (hamstring) will begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A Charlotte on Saturday, Scott Merkin of MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 8: Lee (ankle) will begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A Charlotte on Friday, Scott Merkin of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Fraser Ellard
COMMENT: May 4: The White Sox placed Ellard on the 15-day injured list Sunday due to a left lat strain.

NAME: Martin Perez
COMMENT: Apr 28: White Sox manager Will Venable said last Tuesday that he anticipates Perez (elbow) returning from the 60-day injured list at some point in September, ESPN.com reports. "He's continuing to get evaluated," Venable said of Perez, who was diagnosed last week with a flexor tendon strain in his left elbow. "We're going to treat him and expect him to pitch later on in the summer."

NAME: Mason Adams
COMMENT: Apr 2: The White Sox announced that Adams underwent successful Tommy John surgery Wednesday, Scott Merkin of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Drew Thorpe
COMMENT: Mar 27: The White Sox placed Thorpe (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Thursday.

NAME: Prelander Berroa
COMMENT: Mar 23: Berroa (elbow) needs Tommy John surgery, James Fegan of SoxMachine.com reports.

NAME: Ky Bush
COMMENT: Feb 17: Bush will undergo Tommy John surgery on his left elbow Wednesday, Scott Merkin of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Edgar Navarro
COMMENT: Apr 5: Navarro will undergo Tommy John surgery in March, Scott Merkin of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jeimer Candelario
COMMENT: May 15: Candelario (back) played catch on the field at Great American Ball Park on Thursday, Charlie Goldsmith of the Dayton Daily News reports.

NAME: TJ Friedl
COMMENT: May 15: Friedl (wrist) is out of the lineup for Thursday's game against the White Sox.

NAME: Rhett Lowder
COMMENT: May 12: Lowder (forearm) gave up five runs (four earned) on five hits and one walk while striking out five over three innings in his rehab start Sunday with High-A Dayton.

NAME: Wade Miley
COMMENT: May 12: Miley (elbow) allowed three runs on three hits and struck out six over 2.2 innings in a rehab start at High-A Dayton on Saturday.

NAME: Ian Gibaut
COMMENT: May 12: Gibault (shoulder) struck out two over one inning for Triple-A Louisville on Sunday.

NAME: Sam Moll
COMMENT: May 11: Moll (shoulder) has allowed five runs on eight hits and three walks while striking out nine over seven innings across seven appearances while on a rehab assignment with Triple-A Louisville.

NAME: Jake Fraley
COMMENT: May 10: Reds manager Terry Francona on Friday discussed the idea of placing Fraley (calf) on the 10-day injured list, Jeremy Rakes of MLB.com reports. "We talked to Jake and we were like, 'We appreciate you trying to push this,' but what are the chances he plays tonight and he doesn't feel good tomorrow?" Francona said. "So if we IL him [Saturday], we can push it back three days."

NAME: Tyler Callihan
COMMENT: May 9: The Reds placed Callihan on the 10-day injured list Tuesday with a fractured left forearm.

NAME: Hunter Greene
COMMENT: May 9: Greene suffered a Grade 1 right groin strain during his start Wednesday against Atlanta, Gordon Wittenmyer of The Cincinnati Enquirer reports.

NAME: Christian Encarnacion-Strand
COMMENT: May 7: Reds manager Terry Francona said Wednesday that Encarnacion-Strand (back) is "continuing to take steps" forward in his recovery process and could begin ramping up his baseball activities next week, Charlie Goldsmith of the Dayton Daily News reports.

NAME: Noelvi Marte
COMMENT: May 7: Reds manager Terry Francona said that Marte's placement on injured list Wednesday was due to a Grade 2 left oblique strain, Charlie Goldsmith of the Dayton Daily News reports.

NAME: Josh Staumont
COMMENT: Apr 23: The Reds reassigned Staumont to minor-league camp Saturday.

COMMENT: Mar 27: Reds manager Terry Francona announced that Collier is scheduled to have surgery Thursday on his injured left thumb, Pat Brennan of The Cincinnati Enquirer reports. Collier is expected to resume hitting in 4-to-6 weeks.

COMMENT: Mar 26: The Reds transferred Williamson (elbow) to the 60-day injured list Tuesday.

NAME: Julian Aguiar
COMMENT: Feb 13: Aguiar will miss the entire 2025 season after undergoing Tommy John surgery, Mark Sheldon of MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 9: Estrada (wrist) has resumed fielding drills and running the bases this week, MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 8: Freeman (oblique) will begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A Albuquerque this weekend, Patrick Lyons of JustBaseball.com reports.

COMMENT: May 11: no

COMMENT: May 9: Wright has been pulled off his rehab assignment due to right shoulder fatigue.

COMMENT: May 7: Harvey (shoulder) came away from his most recent live batting practice session Tuesday with a bit of soreness, Anne Rogers of MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 2: Marsh (shoulder) started a new throwing program on April 25, MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 1: McArthur (elbow) continues to rehab in Kansas City but hasn't progressed quickly and is not throwing yet, MLB.com reports.

COMMENT: May 1: Blanco (Achilles) went 1-for-3 in his first rehab game Tuesday for Triple-A Omaha.

COMMENT: Apr 26: Mitchell (wrist) has started playing in extended spring training games, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Victor Gonzalez

COMMENT: May 10: Hurt (elbow) has resumed throwing off a mound but hasn't yet progressed to full bullpen sessions, per MLB.com.

COMMENT: May 15: Buxton entered concussion protocol after exiting Thursday's game against Baltimore following a collision with Carlos Correa, Dan Hayes of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Harrison Bader
COMMENT: May 15: Bader is out of the lineup for Thursday's game against the Orioles after exiting in the third inning of the Twins' 8-6 win in the second game of a doubleheader Wednesday due to left groin tightness, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Ty France
COMMENT: May 15: France (foot) is out of the lineup for Thursday's game against the Orioles.

NAME: Michael Tonkin
COMMENT: May 11: Tonkin (shoulder) has developed biceps tendinitis during his rehab assignment and will receive an injection, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Matt Wallner
COMMENT: May 11: Wallner (hamstring) has started up a running program that includes turns, and he's also taking batting practice, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Luke Keaschall
COMMENT: Apr 28: Keaschall may not need surgery on his fractured right ulna bone, but is still expected to miss two months or more, the Minnesota Star Tribune reports. "It's probably going to be a couple months before he's back into playing games," said Twins head athletic trainer Nick Paparesta.

NAME: Yunior Severino
COMMENT: Apr 26: The Twins re-signed Severino to a minor-league contract Monday.

NAME: Erasmo Ramirez
COMMENT: Mar 27: The Twins reassigned Ramirez (shoulder) to minor-league camp Sunday, Phil Miller of The Minnesota Star Tribune reports.

NAME: Daniel Duarte
COMMENT: Mar 27: The Twins re-signed Duarte (elbow) to a minor-league contract on Nov. 6.

NAME: Paul Blackburn
COMMENT: May 15: Blackburn (knee) is expected to make two more rehab starts before being activated from the 15-day injured list, Joe Pantorno of AMNY.com reports.

NAME: Drew Smith
COMMENT: May 15: Smith (elbow) has been playing catch from 120 feet up to three times per week and threw 10 pitches from halfway up the mound earlier this week, Joe Pantorno of AMNY.com reports.

NAME: Jose Siri
COMMENT: May 13: Siri is progressing more quickly than expected in his recovery from a fractured tibia and has already resumed baseball activities, Tim Britton of the Athletic reports.

NAME: Ronny Mauricio
COMMENT: May 12: Mauricio (knee) had his rehab assignment moved to Double-A Binghamton on Saturday.

NAME: Sean Manaea
COMMENT: May 9: Manaea (oblique) played catch from 120 feet Friday and is soon expected to start throwing off a mound, Andrew Tredinnick of The Bergen Record reports.

NAME: Frankie Montas
COMMENT: May 6: Montas (lat) threw his third bullpen session Tuesday since resuming his throwing program in mid-April, MLB.com reports.

NAME: A.J. Minter
COMMENT: May 5: Minter will undergo surgery May 12 to repair a torn left lat, Mike Puma of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Jesse Winker
COMMENT: May 5: Winker has been diagnosed with a Grade 2 oblique strain and is expected to miss the next 6-to-8 weeks, Abbey Mastracco of the New York Daily News reports.

NAME: Danny Young
COMMENT: May 4: The Mets transferred Young (elbow) from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day IL on Sunday.

NAME: Brooks Raley
COMMENT: Apr 30: Raley (elbow) signed a one-year contract with the Mets on Friday, Joel Sherman of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Yacksel Rios
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Mets reassigned Rios to minor-league camp Sunday.

NAME: Bryce Montes de Oca
COMMENT: Mar 27: Montes de Oca underwent a second Tommy John surgery toward the end of last year's minor-league season, Michael Mayer of MetsmerizedOnline.com reports.

NAME: Adbert Alzolay
COMMENT: Mar 27: The Mets signed Alzolay to a two-year minor-league contract Friday, Will Sammon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Christian Scott
COMMENT: Mar 5: Scott will throw from 45 feet Monday as he continues his recovery from hybrid elbow surgery performed last September, Will Sammon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Oliver Ortega
COMMENT: Mar 2: Ortega (elbow) signed a minor-league contract with the Mets that includes an invitation to spring training Sunday, Jon Morosi of MLB Networkreports.

NAME: Nick Madrigal
COMMENT: Feb 28: Madrigal will likely miss the entire season after surgery to repair a fractured left shoulder, Tim Healey of Newsday reports.

NAME: Oswaldo Cabrera
COMMENT: May 14: Cabrera will undergo an MRI and seek multiple opinions before deciding whether to have surgery to repair his fractured left ankle, Greg Joyce of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Jake Cousins
COMMENT: May 14: Cousins (forearm) said May 6 that he's hopeful to return from the 60-day injured list in early-to-mid June, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Spencer Jones
COMMENT: May 14: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said that Jones was placed on Double-A Somerset's 7-day injured list May 6 due to an intercostal injury, Gary Phillips of the New York Daily News reports.

NAME: Giancarlo Stanton
COMMENT: May 12: Stanton (elbows) could be sent to Tampa later in the week to take live at-bats, Brendan Kuty of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Marcus Stroman
COMMENT: May 11: Manager Aaron Boone said Sunday that Stroman (knee) has been experiencing some discomfort after throwing a simulated game Friday, Erik Boland of Newsday reports.

NAME: Scott Effross
COMMENT: May 10: Effross (hamstring) had his rehab assignment transferred to Double-A Somerset on Saturday.

NAME: Jonathan Loaisiga
COMMENT: May 7: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said Wednesday that Loasiga (elbow) will likely remain on his rehab assignment through May 18, Max Goodman of NJ.com reports.

NAME: Gerrit Cole
COMMENT: May 5: Cole (elbow) said that he plans to begin a throwing program in August, Pete Caldera of The Bergen Record reports.

NAME: Jazz Chisholm Jr.
COMMENT: May 2: Manager Aaron Boone said Friday that Chisholm was diagnosed with a high-grade strain of his right oblique and is expected to be sidelined 4-to-6 weeks, Gary Phillips of the New York Daily News reports.

NAME: Luis Gil
COMMENT: Apr 28: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said Monday that Gil (lat) began a throwing program Sunday, Gary Phillips of the New York Daily News reports.

NAME: Clayton Beeter
COMMENT: Apr 21: Beeter (shoulder) struck out all four batters he faced in his first rehab appearance with Single-A Tampa on Sunday.

NAME: JT Brubaker
COMMENT: Apr 1: The Yankees transferred Brubaker (rib) from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day IL on Monday.

NAME: Brennen Davis
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Yankees signed Davis to a minor-league contract Tuesday, Aram Leighton of Just Baseball reports.

NAME: Jayvien Sandridge
COMMENT: Mar 26: Sandridge signed a minor-league contract with the Yankees on Sunday that includes an invitation to big-league spring training.

NAME: Jose Ruiz
COMMENT: May 3: The Phillies placed Ruiz on the 15-day injured list Saturday due to neck spasms, retroactive to May 1, Lochlahn March of The Philadelphia Inquirer reports.

NAME: Matt Kroon
COMMENT: Apr 9: no

NAME: Christian McGowan
COMMENT: Mar 31: McGowan will miss the remainder of the season following Tommy John surgery, Jonathan Mayo of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Hunter Barco
COMMENT: May 15: Barco was promoted to Triple-A Indianapolis on Saturday, Alex Stumpf of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Malcom Nunez
COMMENT: May 15: The Pirates re-signed Nunez to a minor-league contract with an invitation to spring training Friday, Francys Romero of BeisbolFR.com reports.

NAME: Oneil Cruz
COMMENT: May 14: Cruz (back) is not in the Pirates' starting lineup against the Mets on Wednesday.

NAME: Enmanuel Valdez
COMMENT: May 14: The Pirates transferred Valdez (shoulder) from the 10-day injured list to the 60-day IL on Wednesday.

NAME: Endy Rodriguez
COMMENT: May 14: Rodriguez (finger) will begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A Indianapolis on Wednesday.

NAME: Anthony Solometo
COMMENT: May 14: Double-A Altoona placed Solometo on the 60-day injured list May 7 with a left shoulder injury.

NAME: Spencer Horwitz
COMMENT: May 10: Horwitz (wrist) has gone 4-for-28 with five strikeouts on his rehab assignment split between Double-A Altoona and Triple-A Indianapolis.

NAME: Nick Gonzales
COMMENT: May 7: Gonzales (ankle) ran on the field Monday and took batting practice Tuesday, Alex Stumpf of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Justin Lawrence
COMMENT: May 3: The Pirates transferred Lawrence (elbow) from the 15-day injured list to the 60-day injured list Saturday.

NAME: Jared Jones
COMMENT: Apr 30: Jones (elbow) began a throwing program Wednesday, Noah Hiles of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reports.

NAME: Dauri Moreta
COMMENT: Apr 29: Moreta (elbow) will begin a rehab assignment with Single-A Bradenton on Tuesday.

NAME: Burch Smith
COMMENT: Apr 26: Smith left Friday's appearance for Triple-A Indianapolis after facing just one batter with an undisclosed injury, the Minnesota Star Tribune reports.

NAME: Tim Mayza
COMMENT: Apr 24: Mayza (shoulder) was transferred to the 60-day injured list Thursday, Colin Beazley of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reports.

NAME: Johan Oviedo
COMMENT: Apr 17: Oviedo (lat/elbow) is throwing from 75 feet, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Matt Waldron
COMMENT: May 15: Waldron (oblique) began a rehab assignment in the Arizona Complex League on Thursday, Jeff Sanders of The San Diego Union-Tribune reports.

NAME: Yu Darvish
COMMENT: May 13: Padres manager Mike Shildt said Monday that Darvish (elbow) will begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A El Paso on Wednesday, Kyle Glaser of Foul Territory TV reports.

NAME: Ethan Salas
COMMENT: May 13: Padres general manager A.J. Preller said Monday that Salas has been diagnosed with a stress reaction in his lower back and is expected to remain out until July, AJ Cassavell of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jhony Brito
COMMENT: May 12: Brito underwent a UCL internal brace surgery and a repair of his flexor tendon last month and will miss the entire 2025 season, AJ Cassavell of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Bryan Hoeing
COMMENT: May 11: Hoeing (shoulder) began a rehab assignment Saturday with the Padres' rookie-level Arizona Complex League affiliate, retiring one batter while allowing three earned runs on three hits.

NAME: Luis Patino
COMMENT: May 1: Patino (elbow) will make a rehab start with Single-A Lake Elsinore on Sunday.

NAME: Mason McCoy
COMMENT: Apr 29: The Padres placed McCoy on the 10-day injured list Tuesday with a sprained finger on his left hand.

NAME: Logan Gillaspie
COMMENT: Apr 27: The Padres placed Gillaspie on the 15-day injured list Sunday due to a left oblique strain.

NAME: Joe Musgrove
COMMENT: Apr 7: Musgrove (elbow) played catch Monday for the first time since undergoing Tommy John surgery, AJ Cassavell of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Tyler Fitzgerald
COMMENT: May 13: Fitzgerald (rib) started at second base and went 1-for-3 with a run scored in Triple-A Sacramento's 5-3 win over Salt Lake on Tuesday.

NAME: Casey Schmitt
COMMENT: May 13: Schmitt (oblique) started at first base and went 1-for-3 with a run scored in Triple-A Sacramento's 5-3 win over Salt Lake on Tuesday.

NAME: Tom Murphy
COMMENT: May 12: Murphy (back) will be re-evaluated in six weeks, Alex Pavlovic of NBC Sports Bay Area reports.

NAME: Jerar Encarnacion
COMMENT: May 11: Encarnacion (hand) went 2-for-3 with an RBI double and a run scored in Triple-A Sacramento's 7-5 win over Triple-A Tacoma on Saturday.

NAME: Enny Romero
COMMENT: Mar 30: Romero is away from the Giants due to personal reasons, Maria Guardado of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Cole Waites
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Giants reassigned Waites to minor-league camp Wednesday, Justice delos Santos of The San Jose Mercury News reports.

NAME: Ethan Small
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Giants reassigned Small to minor-league camp Wednesday, Justice delos Santos of The San Jose Mercury News reports.

NAME: Ryan Murphy
COMMENT: Mar 27: no

NAME: J.P. Crawford
COMMENT: May 14: Crawford was scratched from the lineup before Wednesday's game against the Yankees due to shoulder tightness, Adam Jude of The Seattle Times reports.

NAME: Bryce Miller
COMMENT: May 14: Miller (2-4) allowed seven runs on eight hits and two walks while striking out three over five-plus innings to take the loss versus the Blue Jays on Sunday.

NAME: Logan Gilbert
COMMENT: May 13: Gilbert (elbow) threw roughly 25 pitches in Tuesday's bullpen session, Adam Jude of The Seattle Times reports.

NAME: George Kirby
COMMENT: May 12: Kirby (shoulder) is expected to make another minor-league rehab start with Triple-A Tacoma on Friday in Albuquerque, Daniel Kramer of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Trent Thornton
COMMENT: May 9: The Mariners and Thornton avoided arbitration by agreeing to a one-year, $2 million contract Thursday, Daniel Kramer of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Luke Raley
COMMENT: Apr 30: The Mariners placed Raley on the 10-day injured list Wednesday with a right oblique strain.

NAME: Gregory Santos
COMMENT: Apr 29: The Mariners placed Santos on the 15-day injured list Friday with right knee inflammation.

NAME: Victor Robles
COMMENT: Apr 25: Mariners general manager Justin Hollander said Friday that Robles' shoulder is healing as hoped and the 27-year-old outfielder could avoid surgery, Adam Jude of The Seattle Times reports.

NAME: Ryan Bliss
COMMENT: Apr 13: The Mariners transferred Bliss (biceps) from the 10-day injured list to the 60-day IL on Sunday.

NAME: Cade Marlowe
COMMENT: Mar 27: Marlowe was outrighted to Triple-A Tacoma on Friday after clearing waivers.

NAME: Jackson Kowar
COMMENT: Mar 2: Kowar (elbow) was placed on the 60-day injured list Sunday, Daniel Kramer of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Taylor Dollard
COMMENT: Feb 26: Dollard will have labrum surgery and is out for the rest of the season, Ryan Divish of The Seattle Times reports.

NAME: Quinn Mathews
COMMENT: May 13: Mathews (shoulder) will make a rehab start this week with the Cardinals' Florida Complex League affiliate, Derrick Goold of the St. Louis Post-Dispatch reports.

NAME: Cooper Hjerpe
COMMENT: Apr 15: Double-A Springfield transferred Hjerpe (elbow) from the 7-day injured list to the full season injured list Tuesday.

NAME: Zack Thompson
COMMENT: Apr 8: Thompson (lat) has progressed to throwing from 100 feet on flat ground, Daniel Guerrero of the St. Louis Post-Dispatch reports.

NAME: Packy Naughton
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Cardinals re-signed Naughton (elbow) to a two-year, minor-league contract Monday, Jeff Jones of the Belleville News-Democrat reports.

NAME: Drew Rom
COMMENT: Mar 30: Rom has been shut down from throwing after feeling soreness in his surgically repaired left shoulder during a recent bullpen session, Derrick Goold of the St. Louis Post-Dispatch reports.

NAME: Victor Santos
COMMENT: Mar 27: Santos (elbow) has compiled a 3.97 ERA, 1.38 WHIP and 26:7 K:BB across 34 innings over his first nine outings (seven starts) in the Dominican Winter League.

NAME: Travis Jankowski
COMMENT: May 15: Jankowski is out of the lineup for Wednesday's game against the Phillies, Ryan Bass of FanDuel Sports Network Sun reports.

NAME: Xavier Isaac
COMMENT: May 14: Isaac (elbow) is 4-for-10 with one home run, four RBI and two runs scored over his last three games at Double-A Montgomery.

NAME: Yandy Diaz
COMMENT: May 13: Diaz is on the restricted list because there was a delay in having his passport renewed as the team traveled to Toronto, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Nate Lavender
COMMENT: May 13: Lavender (elbow) is scheduled to throw his first true bullpen session of the season Tuesday, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Kevin Kelly
COMMENT: May 13: Kelly (glute) could begin a minor-league rehab assignment next week, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Hunter Bigge
COMMENT: May 13: Bigge (lat) recently resumed a throwing program, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Shane McClanahan
COMMENT: May 13: Rays manager Kevin Cash said Sunday that McClanahan still feels some discomfort in his left triceps when playing catch from 60 feet, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Jake Mangum
COMMENT: May 7: Rays manager Kevin Cash said Wednesday that Mangum (groin) will be evaluated the week of May 19 and could head out on a rehab assignment soon thereafter, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Alex Faedo
COMMENT: May 7: Faedo (shoulder) has been shut down from throwing due to neck and shoulder tightness, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jonny DeLuca
COMMENT: May 7: DeLuca (shoulder) began hitting off a tee Monday, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Richie Palacios
COMMENT: May 2: Palacios (knee) has begun jogging on a treadmill, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jonathan Hernandez
COMMENT: Apr 9: The Rays reassigned Hernandez to minor-league camp Monday.

NAME: Gregory Barrios
COMMENT: Apr 3: Barrios is facing a lengthy absence for High-A Bowling Green due to an elbow injury, Sam Dykstra of MLB Pipeline reports.

NAME: Chris Martin
COMMENT: May 14: Martin said Wednesday that an MRI on his right elbow came back negative, Jeff Wilson of AllDLLS.com reports.

NAME: Corey Seager
COMMENT: May 14: Rangers manager Bruce Bochy said it's possible Seager (hamstring) will require longer than a minimum stay on the 10-day injured list, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Kevin Pillar
COMMENT: May 14: Pillar (back) will begin a rehab assignment with Double-A Frisco on Wednesday.

NAME: Luke Jackson
COMMENT: May 13: Jackson's hand is still swollen Tuesday but he's optimistic he'll be able to avoid the injured list, Evan Grant of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Cody Bradford
COMMENT: May 12: Bradford (elbow) will throw a bullpen session Thursday, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Dane Acker
COMMENT: May 8: Acker (undisclosed) was reinstated from High-A Hickory's 7-day injured list May 24 and has covered five innings while striking out seven and allowing two earned runs on four hits and three walks over his first two starts of the 2023 season.

NAME: Jon Gray
COMMENT: May 1: Gray (wrist) has been cleared to do some light throwing next week, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Kumar Rocker
COMMENT: May 1: Rocker (shoulder) said Thursday that he will likely throw a bullpen session next week, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Malcolm Moore
COMMENT: Apr 17: Moore was placed on the injured list at High-A Hub City on Thursday with a broken finger on his right hand, Kennedi Landry of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Patrick Murphy
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Rangers signed Murphy to a minor-league contract Monday that includes an invitation to spring training camp.

NAME: Jax Biggers
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Rangers signed Biggers to a minor-league contract and gave him an invitation to spring training Thursday.

NAME: Josh Sborz
COMMENT: Feb 17: The Rangers placed Sborz (shoulder) on the 60-day injured list Monday.

NAME: Andres Gimenez
COMMENT: May 14: Gimenez (quadricep) resumed baseball activities Tuesday, Mitch Bannon of the Athletic reports.

NAME: Ryan Burr
COMMENT: May 13: Burr (shoulder) will shift his rehab assignment to Triple-A Buffalo on Wednesday, Mitch Bannon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Erik Swanson
COMMENT: May 13: Swanson (forearm) will pitch for Triple-A Buffalo on Wednesday, Mitch Bannon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Max Scherzer
COMMENT: May 13: Scherzer (thumb) was unable to throw as scheduled Tuesday because of back tightness following his last bullpen session, Mitch Bannon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Nick Sandlin
COMMENT: May 6: Sandlin (lat) has been playing catch up to 60 feet, Mitch Bannon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Alek Manoah
COMMENT: May 2: Manoah (elbow) is throwing regular bullpen sessions at the Blue Jays' spring training complex in Dunedin, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Josh Kasevich
COMMENT: Mar 27: Kasevich will be sidelined several weeks after aggravating a stress reaction in his lower back in a game last weekend, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Angel Bastardo
COMMENT: Mar 12: The Rangers placed Bastardo (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Wednesday, Keegan Matheson of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Adam Kloffenstein
COMMENT: Mar 2: Kloffenstein is dealing with right shoulder fatigue but recently underwent an MRI that came back negative, Keegan Matheson of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Mitchell Parker
COMMENT: May 14: Parker was removed from his start Wednesday against Atlanta after getting hit on his left leg by a line drive, Bobby Blanco of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Andres Chaparro
COMMENT: May 14: Chaparro (oblique) has been sent to the rookie-level Florida Complex League Nationals to begin a rehab assignment.

NAME: Joan Adon
COMMENT: May 13: Adon (biceps) pitched a scoreless inning during Saturday's Grapefruit League game against the Astros.

NAME: Luis Garcia Jr.
COMMENT: May 13: Garcia went 1-for-3 with a solo home run and two RBI in Sunday's win over the Reds.

NAME: Jarlin Susana
COMMENT: May 11: Double-A Harrisburg placed Susana on its 7-day injured list Saturday due to a Grade 1 UCL sprain in his right elbow, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Derek Law
COMMENT: May 9: Law (forearm) is slated to throw off a mound before the end of this week, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Orlando Ribalta
COMMENT: May 9: Ribalta (biceps) will throw a 20-to-25 pitch bullpen session Saturday, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Paul DeJong
COMMENT: Apr 29: DeJong isn't expected to return from the 10-day injured list for at least two months after undergoing surgery Monday to repair his nose and sinuses, Bob Nightengale of USA Today reports. He also had a titanium orbital plate inserted as part of the procedure.

NAME: DJ Herz
COMMENT: Apr 16: Nationals manager Dave Martinez confirmed that Herz (elbow) underwent Tommy John surgery Wednesday in Dallas, Andrew Golden of The Washington Post reports.

NAME: Tyler Stuart
COMMENT: Apr 3: The Nationals promoted Stuart from Double-A Harrisburg to Triple-A Rochester on Tuesday.

NAME: Mason Thompson
COMMENT: Feb 19: Nationals manager Dave Martinez said Friday that Thompson (elbow) has a chance to be ready in time for Opening Day, Spencer Nusbaum of The Washington Post reports.

NAME: Josiah Gray
COMMENT: Feb 16: The Nationals placed Gray (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Sunday, Andrew Golden of The Washington Post reports.
